select.if: select * from icbc_erp_kj_icbc where type_id=#{type_id} and icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and status order by dt_edit desc limit 1
select * from icbc_erp_commontype where erp_btype_id=#{erp_btype_id}
select * from icbc_erp_commtaskname where status=#{status}
select * from icbc_erp_kj_icbc where id=#{id}

select *, fs.`name` as fsname, gems.`name` as gemsname, cars.id as carsid, kk.id as kkid, dk.id as dkid, mq.id as mqid, fs.id as fsid, gems.id as gemsid, fs.id as fsid, icbc.mid_add as icbc_adminid, cars.gems_code as cars_gems_code, kk.gems_code as kk_gems_code, dk.gems_code as dk_gems_code, mq.gems_code as mq_gems_code, kk.kk_car_stateid as kk_car_stateidd, kk.kk_car_cityid as kk_car_cityidd, kk.kk_loan_stateid as kk_loan_stateidd, kk.kk_loan_cityid as kk_loan_cityidd from kj_icbc icbc LEFT JOIN assess_cars cars ON cars.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kk ON kk.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_cardk dk ON dk.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_mq mq ON mq.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs ON fs.id=icbc.gems_fs_id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems ON gems.id=icbc.gems_id where icbc.id=#{icbc_id} limit 1

select * from (select admin.*, t3.name as fsname, gems.cp as gemscp, gems.mobile as mobile from ( select t1.*, if(find_in_set(up_id, @pids) > 0, @pids := concat(@pids, ',', id), 0) as ischild from ( select * from assess_fs fs where fs.fs_type=2 and fs.deltag=0 order by fs.up_id,fs.id ) t1, (select @pids :=#{fsid} ) t2 ) t3 LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin ON t3.id=admin.icbc_erp_fsid LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems ON gems.id=admin.gemsid where (admin.id and t3.ischild != 0) or t3.id=#{fsid} order by admin.dt_edit desc) t4 where t4.deltag=0

select eki.dt_add as sdate, eki.dt_edit as edate, commontype.name as commontype_name, taskname.name as taskname_name, fs.name as fname, gems.name as gname, admin.name as gname1, kir.* from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result kir LEFT JOIN kj_icbc icbc on icbc.id=kir.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin on admin.id=kir.mid_add LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc eki on eki.id=kir.qryid LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commontype commontype on commontype.id=kir.type_id LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commtaskname taskname on taskname.`status`=kir.status LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on icbc.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on icbc.gems_id=gems.id where kir.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and kir.type_id=#{type_id} ORDER BY kir.id asc

select eki.dt_add as sdate, eki.dt_edit as edate, commontype.name as commontype_name, taskname.name as taskname_name, fs.name as fname, gems.name as gname, admin.name as gname1, cars.id as cars_id, kir.* from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result kir LEFT JOIN assess_cars cars on cars.icbc_id=kir.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin on admin.id=kir.mid_add LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc eki on eki.id=kir.qryid LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commontype commontype on commontype.id=kir.type_id LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commtaskname taskname on taskname.`status`=kir.status LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on admin.icbc_erp_fsid=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on admin.gemsid=gems.id where kir.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and kir.type_id=#{type_id} ORDER BY kir.id asc

select eki.dt_add as sdate, eki.dt_edit as edate, commontype.name as commontype_name, taskname.name as taskname_name, fs.name as fname, gems.name as gname, admin.name as gname1, kir.* from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result kir LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc eki on eki.id=kir.qryid LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin on admin.id=kir.mid_add LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commontype commontype on commontype.id=kir.type_id LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commtaskname taskname on taskname.`status`=kir.status LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on eki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on eki.gems_id=gems.id where kir.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and kir.type_id=#{type_id} and kir.status!=0 ORDER BY kir.id asc

select eki.dt_add as sdate, eki.dt_edit as edate, commontype.name as commontype_name, taskname.name as taskname_name, fs.name as fname, gems.name as gname, admin.name as gname1, kk.id as kk_id, kk.kk_date as kk_date, kir.* from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result kir LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kk on kk.icbc_id=kir.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin on admin.id=kir.mid_add LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc eki on eki.id=kir.qryid LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commontype commontype on commontype.id=kir.type_id LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commtaskname taskname on taskname.`status`=kir.status LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on kk.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on kk.gems_id=gems.id where kir.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and kir.type_id=#{type_id} ORDER BY kir.id asc

select eki.dt_add as sdate, eki.dt_edit as edate, commontype.name as commontype_name, taskname.name as taskname_name, fs.name as fname, gems.name as gname, admin.name as gname1, mq.id as mq_id, kir.* from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result kir LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_mq mq on mq.icbc_id=kir.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin on admin.id=kir.mid_add LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc eki on eki.id=kir.qryid LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commontype commontype on commontype.id=kir.type_id LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commtaskname taskname on taskname.`status`=kir.status LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on mq.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on mq.gems_id=gems.id where kir.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and kir.type_id=#{type_id} ORDER BY kir.id asc

select eki.dt_add as sdate, eki.dt_edit as edate, commontype.name as commontype_name, taskname.name as taskname_name, fs.name as fname, gems.name as gname, admin.name as gname1, dk.id as dk_id, kir.* from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result kir LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_cardk dk on dk.icbc_id=kir.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin on admin.id=kir.mid_add LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc eki on eki.id=kir.qryid LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commontype commontype on commontype.id=kir.type_id LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commtaskname taskname on taskname.`status`=kir.status LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on dk.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on dk.gems_id=gems.id where kir.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and kir.type_id=#{type_id} ORDER BY kir.id asc

select eki.dt_add as sdate, eki.dt_edit as edate, commontype.name as commontype_name, taskname.name as taskname_name, fs.name as fname, gems.name as gname, admin.name as gname1, kir.* from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result kir LEFT JOIN assess_admin admin on admin.id=kir.mid_add LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_kj_icbc eki on eki.id=kir.qryid LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commontype commontype on commontype.id=kir.type_id LEFT JOIN icbc_erp_commtaskname taskname on taskname.`status`=kir.status LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on eki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on eki.gems_id=gems.id where kir.icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and kir.type_id=#{type_id} ORDER BY kir.id asc
select * from assess_cars c LEFT JOIN kj_icbc i ON i.id=c.icbc_id WHERE c.icbc_id
select * from assess_cars_item where cars_id=#{cars_id}
select * from kjs_icbc_kk kk LEFT JOIN kj_icbc i ON i.id=kk.icbc_id WHERE kk.icbc_id
select * from kjs_icbc_mq mq LEFT JOIN kj_icbc i ON i.id=mq.icbc_id WHERE mq.icbc_id
select * from kjs_icbc_cardk dk LEFT JOIN kj_icbc i ON i.id=dk.icbc_id WHERE dk.icbc_id
select * from icbc_erp_commontype
select * from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result
select * from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id=#{icbc_id} and status=#{status} and type_id=#{type_id} order by dt_edit
select type_id from icbc_erp_kj_icbc where icbc_id=#{icbc_id}

insert.if: insert into icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result( id, qryid, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, status, status_oldht, remark, result_1_code, result_1_msg, result_1_value, dt_sub, type_id, icbc_id, jsonAll )value( #{id}, #{qryid}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{status}, #{status_oldht}, #{remark}, #{result_1_code}, #{result_1_msg}, #{result_1_value}, #{dt_sub}, #{type_id}, #{icbc_id}, #{jsonAll} )

update.if: update kj_icbc set mid_edit=#{mid_edit}, bc_status =#{bc_status}, zx_result =#{zx_result}, dt_edit=#{dt_edit} where id=#{icbc_id}
